metadata.title: CVE-2016-3895 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the Region::unflatten function in libs/ui/Region.cpp inmediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-09-01 and 7.0 before 2016-09-01allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application,aka internal bug 29983260.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
